characters: Aries-1B Lunar Shuttle Captain (as Edward Bishop)

dialogues.Elena:
[1]
[2]
[3]					    How nice to see you, Hyewood. 					    This is my good friend, Dr. 					    Heywood Floyd. I'd like you 					    to meet Andre Smyslov...  
[4]					    And this is Dr. Kalinan... 					    Stretyneva...  
[5]					    Well... How's your lovely 					    wife?  12/7/65										  b29  
[6]					    And your charming little daughter?  
[7]					    Oh, that's such a delightful age.  
[8]					    He's fine. But I'm afraid we 					    don't get a chance to see each 					    other very much these days.  
[9]					    Actually, we're on our way back 					    from the moon. We've just 					    spent three months calibrating 					    the new antenna at Tchalinko. 					    And what about you?  
[10]					    Another thing, Heywood, two 					    days ago, one of our rocket 					    buses was denied permission 					    for an emergency landing at 					    Clavius.  12/7/65										  b33  
[11]					    Clavius Control came on the 					    air just long enough to transmit 					    their refusal.  
[12]
[13]					    Are you sure you won't change 					    your mind about a drink?  
[14]					    Well, I hope that you and your 					    wife can come to the I.A.C. 					    conference in June.  12/7/65										  b33c 
[15]					    Well, Gregor and I will look 					    forward to seeing you.
dialogues.Poole's:
[1]
[2]
[3]
[4]
[5]					    The purpose of this mission is no 					    more than to carry out a 					    continuation of the space program 					    and further our general knowledge 					    of the planets. Is this true?
dialogues.Mother:
[1]
[2]					    David... again we want to wish 					    you a happy Birthday and God speed. 					    We'll talk to you again tomorrow. 					    'Bye, 'bye now.
dialogues.Father:
[1]
[2]					    Well, David there is a man telling 					    us that we've used up our time.
